articles.author: Adam Cooper
articles.title: Hamilton counting down days to Mercedes F1 launch amid "painful" races - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Lewis Hamilton says he is counting down the days to the launch of next year's Mercedes W15 Formula 1 car after a run of "painful" races for his team.
articles.content:
Mercedes had another difficult weekend at Monza, where Ferrari was clearly a step ahead and the W14 was the third-fastest car.
George Russell and Hamilton eventually finished fifth and sixth as they… [+2083 chars]

articles.title: Line up confirmed for 2023 Ryder Cup celebrity All-Star Match in Rome - RyderCup.com
